item.title: Adding shops to [317] Optimized Delta
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

NVM Fixed =D.

case 155: // first Click npc client.NPCSlot = client.inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); client.NPCID = Server.npcHandler.npcs[client.NPCSlot].npcType; FirstOptionNpc.packet155(client, client.NPCSlot, client.NPCID); boolean PutNPCCoords = false; if (PutNPCCoords == true) { client.skillX = Server.npcHandler.npcs[client.NPCSlot].absX; client.skillY = Server.npcHandler.npcs[client.NPCSlot].absY; } if(client.NPCID == 520) { PutNPCCoords = true; client.WanneShop = 18; } break;
